design.appearanceSpecification: The landing page will feature a clean and vibrant design with a yellow and green color scheme, evoking the freshness of bananas. A large, high-quality image of a banana bunch will be prominent. Typography will be friendly and readable, using a sans-serif font. Ample white space will be used to ensure a clutter-free experience.
design.blueprint:
- Header:
  - App Title: "Banana Paradise"
- Hero Section:
  - Main Image: A large, appealing image of a bunch of ripe bananas.
  - Headline: "Discover the Wonderful World of Bananas"
  - Subheadline: "Nutritious, delicious, and versatile - learn all about your favorite fruit."
  - Call to Action Button: "Learn More"
- About Bananas Section:
  - Section Title: "Why Bananas?"
  - Content Area: Text detailing nutritional benefits and general information about bananas.
  - Supporting Image: A smaller image, perhaps showing a peeled banana or a banana split.
- Banana Varieties Section:
  - Section Title: "Explore Different Varieties"
  - Content Area: A brief overview of popular banana types (e.g., Cavendish, Plantain).
  - Image Carousel/Grid: Small images of different banana varieties with their names.
- Recipe Ideas Section:
  - Section Title: "Taste the Goodness"
  - Content Area: Short descriptions of banana-based recipes.
  - Call to Action Button: "View Recipes"
- Footer:
  - Copyright Information
design.functionalitySpecification:
1. **Landing Page Display**: The applet will present a static landing page with information about bananas.
   - **View Headline and Subheadline**: Users will see a prominent headline and subheadline about bananas.
   - **View Hero Image**: A large image of bananas will be displayed at the top.
   - **Navigate to More Information**: Clicking the 'Learn More' button will scroll the user down to the 'About Bananas' section.
   - **View Banana Details**: Users can read about the nutritional benefits and general information about bananas.
   - **View Banana Varieties**: Users can see images and names of different banana varieties. If implemented as a carousel, users can swipe/click to view more varieties.
   - **View Recipe Teasers**: Users can read brief descriptions of banana recipes.
   - **Navigate to Recipes**: Clicking the 'View Recipes' button will simulate navigation to a separate recipe section (in a real app, this would link to another page or section).
   - **View Footer**: Copyright information will be visible at the bottom.
design.name: Banana Landing Page

kids.description: A group containing the hero image, headline, and subheadline.
A button to scroll down to more information.
A section detailing nutritional benefits and general information about bananas.
A section showcasing different banana varieties with images and names.
A section with recipe teasers and a button to view recipes.

value.value: Discover the Wonderful World of Bananas
Nutritious, delicious, and versatile - learn all about your favorite fruit.

Bananas are packed with essential nutrients like potassium, vitamin C, and vitamin B6. They are a great source of energy and fiber, making them an ideal snack for people of all ages.  Their natural sweetness and creamy texture make them incredibly versatile in the kitchen, from smoothies to baked goods.
Discover the diverse world of bananas, each with its unique flavor and texture.
Whip up delicious treats with ripe bananas. Try banana bread, smoothies, or a classic banana split!
